phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and scan the main sections of the homepage to find product information.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely and key sections are visible.

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate and click the 'Learn More', 'Product', or 'Fuel Card Details' link to navigate to the dedicated product page.

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the dedicated product page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards).

phases.objective: Navigate to On https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards, meticulously read through all sections including features, benefits, FAQs, and any eligibility criteria.

assertions.description: Verify that 'Features', 'Benefits', 'FAQs', and 'Eligibility Criteria' sections are present on the product page.
Verify that content within these sections is clearly displayed and legible.

phases.objective: Scroll down to review any presented testimonials, use cases, or comparison charts.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the presence of testimonials, use cases, or comparison charts on the product page.

phases.objective: Navigate to After gathering sufficient information and deciding to proceed, locate and click the 'Apply Now' or 'Get Started' button on the product page to proceed to signup.

assertions.description: Verify that clicking the 'Apply Now' or 'Get Started' button on the product page redirects to the signup/application page.

phases.objective: Open a mobile browser and navigate to https://www.atob.com.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely and is correctly displayed on a mobile device (responsive design).

phases.objective: Navigate to Quickly scroll down the mobile homepage, scanning for key value propositions and services relevant to trucking fuel cards.

assertions.description: Verify that key value propositions and services are easily scannable and visible on the mobile homepage.

phases.objective: Tap the hamburger menu icon (or similar mobile navigation) to see the available site sections.

assertions.description: Verify that the hamburger menu icon is present, clickable, and expands to show navigation options.

phases.objective: Tap 'Product' or 'Fuel Card Details' from the mobile menu to get a concise overview on https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards.

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the product details page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards) from the mobile menu.

phases.objective: Navigate to Briefly scroll and skim the product details page, focusing on bullet points, key headlines, and prominent features before closing the browser or deciding to bookmark for later.

assertions.description: Verify that key product details (bullet points, headlines, features) are present and clearly legible on the mobile product page.

phases.objective: Navigate directly to https://www.atob.com, likely via a bookmark, email link, or direct URL entry.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely without errors.

phases.objective: Navigate to Look for a prominent 'Login' or 'Continue Application' button, or instinctively click 'Get Started' again, expecting to be prompted to log in or retrieve progress.

assertions.description: Verify that a 'Login' or 'Continue Application' button is visible and clickable on the homepage.

phases.objective: Navigate to On the 'Sign up form' page (https://www.atob.com/get-started), locate fields or links to continue an existing application (e.g., 'Already applied? Click here' or enter email to retrieve progress).

assertions.description: Verify that verify the presence of options to continue an existing application, such as an 'Already applied?' link or an input field to retrieve progress.

phases.objective: Navigate to If prompted, enter login credentials or the necessary identifier (e.g., application ID, email address) to resume the application process.

assertions.description: Verify that entering valid credentials or an identifier successfully resumes the application process and redirects to the appropriate step.

phases.objective: Navigate directly to https://www.atob.com and immediately locate the primary call-to-action for sign-up.

assertions.description: Verify that the homepage loads completely without errors.
Verify that verify the primary call-to-action for sign-up is prominently displayed.

phases.objective: Click the prominent 'Get Started' button (or similar clear CTA) on the homepage without deep exploration.

assertions.description: Verify that clicking the CTA redirects the user to the signup form page (https://www.atob.com/get-started).

phases.objective: Navigate to Efficiently fill out the required fields on the 'Sign up form' page (https://www.atob.com/get-started), such as company name, contact person, and email.

assertions.description: Verify that all required fields (company name, contact person, email) are present and interactive on the form.

phases.objective: Click 'Submit Application' or 'Continue' to complete the initial signup process.

assertions.description: Verify that the form submits successfully and a confirmation message is displayed or the user is redirected to a success page.

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and immediately look for 'Pricing', 'Fees', 'Savings', or 'Rates' links/sections on the homepage.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely.

phases.objective: Navigate to Since no direct pricing page exists, click the 'Fuel Card Details' or 'Product' link (leading to https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards) hoping to find cost information within it.

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the product details page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards).

phases.objective: Navigate to On the product page, quickly scan headlines and specific sections for keywords like 'fees', 'pricing', 'discounts', 'rebates', or 'annual cost'.

assertions.description: Verify that keywords like 'fees', 'pricing', 'discounts', 'rebates', or 'annual cost' are present on the product page, indicating pricing information.

phases.objective: Navigate to If specific pricing isn't immediately visible, look for calls-to-action like 'Request a Quote' or 'Calculate Your Savings' to initiate a personalized cost inquiry.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the presence of 'Request a Quote' or 'Calculate Your Savings' calls-to-action on the page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Based on the discovered information (or lack thereof), decide whether to proceed, contact sales, or leave to compare with other providers.
